title: Publisher Rocket Tutorial: Discover Your Book Competitors and Boost Sales
description:
Are you an author wondering how to find and analyze your competitors? In this video, we dive into Publisher Rocket, a powerful tool for authors that reveals key insights into your book market. Learn how to identify competitors, analyze their keywords, and discover what makes their books stand out to help you craft a successful marketing strategy.
